## Code Style

## Project-Specific Rules
- Configure a GitHub Actions workflow to build the .NET Framework app, compile the installer, publish it via GitHub, and manage updates for both the build and installer with each release. Ensure the workflow includes steps for building the installer via GitHub Actions, as it is essential for the project. 
- Store high configuration settings for the GitHub Actions workflow to ensure optimal performance and maintainability.
